description: Blindly connected first unconnected pin on Intel Nuc, had to write to boot config, had sound upon reboot!
it's help me to fix my microphone issue.
Good app to retask your audio jack

Hi,
This App is the solution for stuttery, choppy and intermittent sound with my MSi B450-A Max Pro motherboard system. The sound hopps from one jack to the other and stutters thus when 3.5mm jack of the speakers are plugged in directly on the back of the PC case (motherboard). The jacks connect each other intermittently and thus the stutter. I left the green 3.5mm jack as is on the Realtek ALC892 and switched all other jacks (it has 6 in the back and one in the front) off to not connected. That solved my horrendous sound issues after restart completely. Hissing and static is gone now as well.
This is one of the greatests Apps for sound problems on certain motherboards (mostly affected are MSi boards).
Tuxedo was clueless about this problem but I found to solve this with this great App.
Thank you so much!
God bless.
summary: Solution for stuttering, choppy sound on Tuxedo OS

description: Wenn man In Out neu defieniren will, sehr praktisch
Solucionó el problema que tenia con BEATS Audio, configurando las entradas quedo perfecto!!
esta app es lo que estaba vuscando para administrar mi harrdware. de intel junto al de nVidia. en mi laptop thinkpad va muy bien.

Très satisfait des services de hdajackretask, pour faire enfin identifier les bonnes prises audio sur un dell optiplex 7010 par un ubuntu 22.04.

Point négatif : la présentation en package obligatoire pour produits RME qui ne sert à rien pour l'essentiel du 'grand public'. Impossible de désinstaller les logiciels pour cartes son RME, sans désinstaller cet utilitaire hdajackretask. Et comme je ne sais pas enlever des logiciels du menu du lanceur d'applications, c'est très pénible de scroller pour rien parmi des applications inutilisées.
